comments.body:
The test should also be checking if:
- the reflector will be restarted after Get() will be called again
- the reflector isn't stopped if we periodically fetch the value

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +388,392 @@
	// Reflector should already be stopped for maxIdleTime exceeded.
	assert.False(t, reflectorRunning())

	obj, _ = store.Get("ns", "name")
